item.title: The stable coins
item.description: In today’s crypto world, a few tokens are said stable. that means stable regarding a specific asset, like fiat or even BTC. Here is a compiled list of a few, with information on the way they are backed and audited. sources: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stablecoin Types of stable coins ğŸ’µ fiat based ğŸª™ crypto curr based ğŸ‘‘ Seigniorage Style Stablecoins (also called algorithmic or synthetic) List name symbol backed how? audit USD Coin USDC ğŸ’µ Grant Thornton, LLP 2021 Tether USDT ğŸ’µ FSS 2018 2021 Binance dollar BUSD ğŸ’µ Withum 2021 Gemini dollar GUSD ğŸ’µ bpmca 2021 Maker DAO dai DAI ğŸª™ 300% smart contracts True USD TUSD ğŸ’µ armanino 2021 StableUnit SU ğŸª™ smart contracts Paxos standard PAX ğŸ’µ Withum 2021 Terra UST ğŸ‘‘ smart contracts Ampleforth AMPL ğŸ‘‘ smart contracts Augmint A-EUR ğŸ‘‘ smart contracts Frax FRAX ğŸª™ ğŸ‘‘ smart contracts sUSD sUSD ğŸª™ ğŸ‘‘ smart contracts mStable mUSD ğŸª™ ğŸ‘‘ smart contracts Fei FEI ğŸª™ ğŸ‘‘ smart contracts Stability and risk The criterias to evaluate the different platforms and protocols would be among the following:
